mapper.select: select w.user_no userNo , w.wishlist_no wishlistNo , p.brand , p.title , p.price from users u , wishlist w , product p where u.user_no = w.user_no and w.product_no = p.product_no and u.user_no = #{userNo}
select c.event_no , c.event_name , c.event_date , u.user_no from calender c , users u where c.user_no = u.user_no and u.user_no = #{userNo}
